mapper.update: UPDATE xt_start_stop_log SET xt_start_stop_log_starttime = #{xt_start_stop_log_starttime}, xt_start_stop_log_stoptime = #{xt_start_stop_log_stoptime}, xt_start_stop_log_iserror = #{xt_start_stop_log_iserror}, xt_start_stop_log_content = #{xt_start_stop_log_content} WHERE xt_start_stop_log_id=#{xt_start_stop_log_id}

WHERE xt_start_stop_log_id=#{xt_start_stop_log_id}
